name: Jajazinho e as Delicias de Cristais
name_original: Jajazinho e as Delicias de Cristais
description:
Meet Jajazinho! The most delicious hero ever!
Penetrate in this delicious adventure for rescuing the gorgeous princess Shemacol from the devilish villain Demalixo!
Through you journey, face off against big and juicy enemies to find the coveted delicious crystals!

- +69 ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) delicious levels!
- Challenging bosses to show you how "MACHO" you are!
- Musical levels for the most refined ears <3
- 8 delicious crystals to collect!
- A wide variety of challenges and stunning backgrounds!
- Lots of enemies that will try to f* you up!
- And more delicious on the way...
